content:
TickMarkStyle Enum

Definition

Specifies a tick mark style when setting the stem.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TickMark.TickMarkStyle* property of a TickMark object.

In this Article

public enum TickMarkStyle
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
TickMarkStyle

Remarks

The TickMarkStyle enumeration represents the styles for major and minor tick marks.

Fields

AcrossAxis

Tick marks are drawn across the relevant axis line.
InsideArea

Tick marks are drawn inside the chart area.
None

Tick marks are disabled.
OutsideArea

Tick marks are drawn outside the chart area.
